timeline.message:
Permits String parameters to be nullable

When markNullable is used, empty strings will be returned as null and.

Fixes: OX-5523

Adds a new job parameter type: String List

Renders a key-value like single select input. Returns null when not required and no value is selected.

Fixes: OX-5523

timeline.bodyText: shouldn't this be the default? null instead of "" - even ifthe parameter isn marked as nullable it still might yield null as Value.getString() does filter null - asString would do this?
timeline.author: andyHa

replies.bodyText: I like that! If we agree on returning null instead of "" for a zero-length input, then there is no need for a markNullable method. I just didn't wanna break the previous behaviour.
replies.author: idlira

replies.bodyText: After analysis, makeNullable made obsolete and defaults to null
replies.author: idlira
